HotelName.HotelShortName: AR AC HOTEL IBERIA LAS PALM

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Spend a day in one of the sunny beaches of the island such as Las Alcaravaneras or San Cristobal

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Stroll by the Vegueta Neighbourhood and discover the Gothic architecture in its building and squares

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: If you like surf visit el Confital, close to Las Canteras beach, enjoy the wave!

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Enjoy the typical Spanish architecture while buying Souvenirs at Triana neighborhood.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Dive inside the Atlantic and sunbathe in the beautiful Las Canteras beach

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: Interested in history?.. .Find out all the clues about Columbus trips in its free Museum.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our hotel in Las Palmas has the space needed for social events or any familiar celebration

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Our event rooms are available for family celebrations such as weddings, baptisms or communions.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Social event rooms in AC Hotel Iberia provides everything required for well-being and work.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Our Staff will help you organize the perfect event to grant you success

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Our catering services can help make any leisure or business event a success.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: This hotel has six exquisitely designed meeting rooms with dimensions starting at 36m² to 187m².

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Our modern hotel meeting rooms are equipped to meet technological for the success of your events.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: The meeting rooms are also equipped with Internet access, telephone, projector and flip chart.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Each of the meeting rooms are dedicated to giving business meetings and holding press conferences.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: The meeting rooms of this hotel offer business facilities, as hiring of computer equipment, fax...

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: In AC Hotel Iberia Las Palmas, we deliver the best service with the best infrastructure to our guest

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Enjoy room entertainment including a Plasma TV with more than 20 channels and a Minibar

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Our full bathrooms are well-equipped with a bathtub, hair dryer, and AC amenities.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Each guestroom is equipped with personalized air conditioning, comfortable beds and reading lights.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Our guests will satisfy all their needs with the 24-hours room service,7 days a week

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Our Superior Rooms are wider and have a variety of special extras such as AC Amenities or a complet

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Superior Rooms also feature slippers, bathrobe, Flat T.V. and stereo system or iPod loudspeaker.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: AC Hotel Iberia Las Palmas offers a complimentary Shuttle service from/ to the airport. Find out more

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: *After sunbathing in our solarium, refresh yourself and enjoy the views while taking a dip in the outdoor swimming pool on our rooftop.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Look after your physical health during your stay and keep in shape in our complimentary Fitness Centre equipped with exercise machines.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: AC Hotel Iberia Las Palmas is an ocean front hotel located on the seafront of the old District, in the Vegueta Neighbourhood, and features a rooftop outdoor swimming pool with solarium.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Hotel AC Iberia Las Palmas is located near the shopping and cultural centre of the city, the Vegueta Neighbourhood, in the Las Palmas promenade. This hotel has been completely refurbished in accordance with the AC Hotels standards. Each room features individual minibar, plasma TV with over 20 channels, individual air conditioning, and fully equipped bathroom. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi Internet in common areas, characteristic AC Lounge, fitness centre, AC breakfast buffet, and outdoor rooftop swimming pool with solarium. The hotel also boasts six event rooms able to hold anything from business meetings to social gatherings. The AC Hotel Iberia Las Palmas is the perfect option for a stay in the Canary Islands.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Our hotel in Las Palmas is an oceanfront hotel located near the city center and the Cathedral of the city, just minutes away from the Marina and the Las Canteras beach. It is also very easily accessible from the airport.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The AC Lounge is a multipurpose space open 24 hours where you can enjoy free Wi-Fi, a varied gastronomic offering and many corners in which to work, rest, read newspapers etc

Restaurant.RestaurantName: AC Hotel Iberia Las Palmas Breakfast Area

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy our tasty breakfast buffet, full of fresh products, baked pastry and natural juices

Description.Name: Additional Oversold Policy
Description.Text: Property will pay transportation to new similar hotel, and any rate differencies

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Head north on Ctra General del Sur.At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit onto the GC-1 ramp to Las Palmas Gran Canaria. Merge onto Autovía Las Palmas-Puerto Rico/GC-1. Take the exit toward Av de Canarias/GC-1. Slight left onto Av de Canarias/GC-1. Take the exit toward Juan XXIII/Carvajal. Turn left onto Av del Alcalde José Ramírez Bethencourt

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Are you ready to enjoy one of the most famous Carnivals of the World? Check the special prices of AC Hotel Iberia Las Palmas, dress up your best costume and have fun. We are waiting for you!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: ¿Estás preparado para disfrutar uno de los Carnavales más famosos del Mundo?. Beneficiate de nuestros precios especiales en AC Hotel Iberia, ponte tu mejor disfraz y disfruta de toda la magia a un paso del hotel. ¡AC Hotels en Las Palmas te espera!
